description: The longer a customer has been with the company, the more likely they are to continue with their account.
Customers who use the service frequently are less likely to churn.
Customers who have had positive interactions with customer support are more likely to stay.
Customers may churn if they find a competitor offering better pricing.
High-quality service leads to higher customer retention.
